Package com.xebisco.yield

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    public final class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    An Entity is a combination of Components and other Entities(called children), can contain game logic and be displayed on the screen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Entity​(java.lang.String name, YldScene scene, Entity parent)
      Creates an entity with a Transform component and a Renderer component.
